name: Lost Temple
description:
Kiluk, the saurian people pursued for ages, has finally found a home. However, the place these primitive beings chose to inhabit hides even more ancient terrors: Tera’s forgotten temple was cursed by envious gods in the past, and now its enchanted treasures corrupt anyone who touches them. Tera’s curse then turned the Kiluks and their pets into horrible, vicious, and vengeful creatures.

Attention: this adventure was designed to be used with Age of Gods but some Dungeons & Dragons Rules Cyclopedia (1991) reference pages are provided to help you adjust or modify it as you please.

https://horoscopezine.itch.io/age-of-gods

If you're the GM, read this material before your gaming session. Keep in mind that this adventure needs some improvisation: hack it to fit your gaming style if necessary.

If you're a player, reading from this point onwards can spoil your fun.
